item.title: Men Fashion Online Shop White Shirt Mafia
item.description: Chief collar shirt Chief mao collar Tropical long sleeve Checkout White Shirt Mafia’s collections if you wanna get more elegant and of course the best price you can ever imagine.

item.title: Mobile Apps Alfamikro Store Sales Point (SSP) for Officer - Phase II
item.description: This project is the continue of previously successful delivery at Phase 1. In this pahse We add new features such as visit plan and transaction orders.

item.title: Markdown Formatting Demo
item.description: This example Markdown file compliments of markdown-it.github.io h1 Heading 8-) h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements Enable typographer option to see result. item.title: Mobile Web Product List & Order WhatsApp Checkout Baked By Karin
item.description: Fuddy brownies Tiramisu Tres leches Baked by Karin is humbly initiated by one of their family members. In their first year of operation, surprisingly a lot of good responses given by its customers.

item.title: Hotel Booking Apps & Web Dashboard Pondok Rasamala Resort
item.description: Booking application Web dashboard Website pondok rasamala The growth of Indonesian Tourism was affecting Pondok Rasamala. They need to adapt how to give best experiences for their customer also easier operation for staff.

item.title: Mobile Apps Alfamikro Store Sales Point (SSP) for Officer - Phase I
item.description: The process of acquiring resellers are need to be done in the field. Officers need to visit their otlet to make sure everythings is properly setup. During that process all the things need to be checklist and review. With this mobile apps, the process of survey until approval is easier to do. This project is done and continue to the Phase II

item.title: Online Portal News Revamp & Cloud Maintenance Poskota
item.description: A lot of news portal that already transform into digital media because printing paper is not simple nowadays to read. Thera are a lot of tools like mobile phones, kindle, iPad and Android tab to read a news. But with the tools it self we need to apply certain optimization so the content will deliver at its finest.

item.title: Backend Microservice for Mobile Social Media Platform Startup
item.description: Not all social media really “keep” its user privacy. We built an apps to humanize social media based on trust and exclusivity.

item.title: Mobile Apps and Web Learning Management System (LMS) for Insurance Company's Sales Training
item.description: Insurance companies need to make their training process become easier. Easy to take also easy to manage. All the training can be done via mobile apps and the content can be prepared via the web dashboard. Updating content will be easy for the content regulator on the other hand the sales team can get access to it anywhere. They still can do the sales meanwhile keep learning about the insurance product.
